original: Kjellgren, Eric, civilingenjör, Åmål, f. 26/6/96 i Gävle av sjökapt. Erik K. o. Alma Ullenius. G. 28 m. Erna Smith. — Studrex. i Gävle 16, KTH (Eltekn.) 22. Konstr. v. Gen. Electric Co.^ i Pittsfield, Mass., USA, 24-26, v. Alliis Chalmers Mfg Co. i Midwaukee, Wis., 26-28, konstr. o. konsult, ing. v. A. O. Smith Corp. i Milwaukee 28-38, tekn. chef v. A-B Sv. Elektromagne-ter i Ämål fr. 38. Klubbmäst. i Åmåls Rotarykl. fr. 46. Hobbies :i motorbåtsport, fiske.
translated: Kjellgren, Eric, engineer, Åmål, b. 26/6/96 in Gävle to ship captain Erik K. and Alma Ullenius. Married in 1928 to Erna Smith. - Studied in Gävle until 1916, graduated from KTH (Electrical Engineering) in 1922. Worked as a designer at General Electric Co. in Pittsfield, Mass., USA from 1924-1926, and at Allis Chalmers Mfg Co. in Milwaukee, Wis. from 1926-1928. Worked as a designer and consultant engineer at A. O. Smith Corp. in Milwaukee from 1928-1938. Technical manager at A-B Swedish Electromagneters in Åmål from 1938. Clubmaster at Åmål Rotary Club since 1946. Hobbies include motorboat racing and fishing.
